description: The largest ship in the world, commanded by Gecko Moria. It's actually an island-sized ship designed to look like a floating island with forests, mansions, and graveyards. Moria uses it as a mobile base for his zombie army.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Split Up Across Thriller Bark
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates divide into groups and spread across Thriller Bark to accomplish multiple objectives simultaneously.
keyEvents.significance: The massive size of Thriller Bark allows for multiple simultaneous operations.

keyEvents.title: Zombie Decimation Across Thriller Bark
keyEvents.description: Luffy and Sanji charge through various areas of Thriller Bark, defeating dozens of zombies.
keyEvents.significance: Showcases the ship's vast layout and zombie population.

keyEvents.title: Oars Explores Thriller Bark
keyEvents.description: Oars awakens and begins exploring the massive ship, marveling at its enormous size and nearly falling off at one point.
keyEvents.significance: Even the ancient giant Oars is impressed by Thriller Bark's scale, emphasizing its unprecedented size.

keyEvents.title: Oars' Mast Jump Separates the Crew
keyEvents.description: When Oars jumps from Thriller Bark's main mast, the impact separates different groups of Straw Hats across the ship.
keyEvents.significance: The ship's architecture plays a key role in the battle tactics and crew movements.

statusHistory.reason: Operating as Gecko Moria's mobile fortress

description: A large Gothic mansion located on Thriller Bark where Gecko Moria, Hogback, Perona, and Absalom reside. Contains laboratories, living quarters, and chambers where zombies are created and stored.

keyEvents.title: Hogback's Frustration in the Mansion
keyEvents.description: Inside the mansion, Hogback becomes frustrated with Absalom's wedding plans and assumes command of zombie forces.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the command center of Thriller Bark operations.

keyEvents.title: Moria and Hogback Observe from the Mansion
keyEvents.description: From within the mansion, Moria and Hogback watch Oars' activities with satisfaction.
keyEvents.significance: The mansion serves as the villains' observation and command post.

statusHistory.reason: Serving as the headquarters for Thriller Bark leadership
